Jim -

Thanks for the input, I understand the problem of
"remote" attributions :-)  On the inlay tsuba,
is there a special name for that type of high
relief (3D) work where the zogan almost sits on
top of the plate and is really rounded? Any
school specializze in that type of inlay?

Thanks
Rich
